gui could use 8x8/1bpp cells, or could also use 8x8/4bpp cells. main
difference: 8x8/4bpp are 32 bytes each.

window: (x,y)=(0',0'),(w,h)
(0',0')=kill img
((w-8)',0')=fullscreen img
((w-16)',0')=restore img
((w-24)',0')=hide img

1bpp cells:

kill: 255,128
00000000 00
01111110 7e
01111110 7e
01111110 7e
01111110 7e
01111110 7e
01111110 7e
00000000 00

fullscreen: 255,128
11111111 ff 00000000 00
11100111 e7 01111110 7e
11100111 e7 01100110 66
11000011 c3 01100110 66
11000011 c3 01000010 42
10000001 81 01000010 42
10000001 81 01111110 7e
11111111 ff 00000000 00

restore: 255,128
00000000 00
01111110 7e
01000110 46
01010110 56
01000110 46
01111110 7e
01111110 7e
00000000 00

hide: 255,128
11111111 ff 00000000 00
10000001 81 01111110 7e
10000001 81 01000010 42
11000011 c3 01000010 42
11000011 c3 01100110 66
11100111 e7 01100110 66
11100111 e7 01111110 7e
11111111 ff 00000000 00

4bpp cells:
